name: Stickman Downhill - bmx cycle - bike racing game - bike game
name_original: Stickman Downhill - bmx cycle - bike racing game - bike game
description:
Bike fun and challenging tracks using your destructible stick biker including jumps, loopings, fire and other funny obstacles. Stick Stunt Biker is an agil and fast physic based bike game.

FEATURES:

Hundreds of crazy tracks and mad worlds
Cool STUNTS
Tons of AMAZING bikes
Don't miss the FREE updates with lots of NEW CONTENT
